refnamediv.refpurpose: Removes the aggregated methods and properties from an object

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Removes the methods and properties from classes that were aggregated to an object. If the optional class_name parameters is passed, only those methods and properties defined in that class are removed, otherwise all aggregated methods and properties are eliminated.
refsect1.simpara: See also aggregate, aggregate_methods, aggregate_methods_by_list, aggregate_methods_by_regexp, aggregate_properties, aggregate_properties_by_list, aggregate_properties_by_regexp, aggregate_info
